author: karthika raveendran
title: Om Puri no more: Kamal Haasan, Rana Daggubati, Dulquer Salmaan, Rakul Preet saddened by the veteran actor‚Äôs sudden demise
text:
Bollywood wishes Rana Daggubati on his 30th birthday 
Om Puri , one of the most talented actors of Bollywood is no more. He passed away after succumbing to a massive heart attack. Ashok Pandit, his close friend confirmed the news. He took to social media to share the same ‚ÄúSad & shocked to know that versatile actor Om Puri jee has expired due to heart attack early morning today. #RIP.‚Äù He is one of those few actors who has worked across different industries ‚Äì Bollywood and Hollywood, He even acted in a Pakistani film ‚Äì Actor in Law. His versatility, talent had no bounds. His contribution to cinema is commendable. Aakrosh, Ard Satya, Mirch Masala are some among the many films that Om Puri was part of. Reportedly, he returned home last evening after his shoot. This morning, when driver came to pick him up, nobody answered the door bell, that‚Äôs when an alarm was raised. The news of his death has come as a shock to several across the Bollywood industry ‚Äì Karan Johar, Madhur Bandarakar, Onir, Shhot Sircar, Priyanka Chopra, Preity Zinta, Kabir Khan, Anupam Kher. Also Read: Salman Khan‚Äôs Tubelight will be Om Puri‚Äôs LAST film ‚Äì view pic 
Even stars down South are saddened over his death So long Omji. Prided myself on being his friend peer & admirer. Who dare say my Om Puri is no more ? He lives through his work. 
‚Äî Kamal Haasan (@ikamalhaasan) January 6, 2017 Extremely saddened to hear the news of Mr. Om Puri. Worked with him on Ghazi. Such a passionate actor with immense love for the craft. RIP 
‚Äî Rana Daggubati (@RanaDaggubati) January 6, 2017 Extremely shocked and sad to hear about the passing of the legend, Om Puri üôÅ Will forever be a huge fan ! 
‚Äî dulquer salmaan (@dulQuer) January 6, 2017 Such a huge loss to d society. An amazing person n an actor beyond excellence .Will miss his presence. RIP Om Puri sir. Gone too soon. üôÅ 
‚Äî Rakul Preet (@Rakulpreet) January 6, 2017 
The actor is survived by his ex-wife Nandita Puri and Ishaan. The actor was last seen in Sunny Deol‚Äôs Ghayal Returns. He also lent his voice for Bagheera for The Jungle Book, 2016. He will be seen in Gurinder Chadda‚Äôs Last Viceroy that will release this year. Also for those who don‚Äôt know, Om Puri has an important role to play in Salman Khan‚Äôs upcoming film ‚Äì Tubelight. Published: January 6, 2017 2:12 pm Topics:
